text: aur agar donon miyo beevee ek doosare se baazarie talaaq juda ho jaen to khuda apane vasee khazaane se (faraagul baalee ata faramaakar) donon ko (ek doosare se) beniyaaz kar dega aur khuda to badee gunjaish aur tadabeer vaala hai aur jo kuchh aasamaanon mein hai aur jo kuchh zameen mein hai (garaj sab kuchh) khuda hee ka hai
